FTPGH001.text:
)Attr Default(%+_)
   + type(text  ) intens(low )
   _ type( input) intens(high) caps(on ) just(left )
   ~ type(text) intens(high) color(yellow)
   ! type(output) intens(low) caps(off) just(left )
)Body  width(80) expand(\\)
+ --\-\-- ~Generate FTP DSN JCL+ --\-\--
%Command ===>_ZCMD                                             %Scroll ===>_amt
+
+ Use this panel to create and edit your FTP profiles.
+
+ To create a profile enter a short description of the product that you
+ will be generating JCL for i.e. %CAI CA1 R12+.
+
+ Enter in the dataset prefix for the install datasets i.e.
+ %SDSMPOEM.CAI.CA1.R12+
+
+ Last, enter in the prefix for any datasets that will catalogued in the
+ master catalog i.e. %SYS3.CA1.R12SP0+ and any datasets that will be SMS
+ managed i.e. %SDPROD.CA1.R12SP0+
+
+ Once these fields have been filled in, enter %C+ to create a new profile.
+
+ You can then edit the profile, by entering a %E+ next to your newly created
+ profile. From this panel, you can either delete datasets that you
+ do not want to FTP such as DLIBs or select datasets for those you
+ want to FTP to a destination system.
+
+ The last option on this panel is to %D+ - delete the profile. This will
+ clear this profile in the table.
)INIT
)REINIT
)PROC
)END

FTPGH002.text:
)Attr Default(%+_)
   + type(text  ) intens(low )
   _ type( input) intens(high) caps(on ) just(left )
   ~ type(text) intens(high) color(yellow)
   ! type(output) intens(low) caps(off) just(left )
)Body  width(80) expand(\\)
+ --\-\-- ~Edit Profile Help --\-\--
%Command ===>_ZCMD                                             %Scroll ===>_amt
+ Use this panel to edit your FTP Profiles. Enter~PF3+to save changes.
+ There are three options available on this panel:
+
+ %S+ - use this to option to select a dataset to be generated in the FTP
+       JCL.  This will result in the appropriate JCL, Catalog (if required),
+       nd FTP statements being generated in a JCL member
+
+ %D+ - use this to option to delete a dataset out of the table.  Using this
+       option will remove the dataset from the display and the dataset will
+       not be selected for FTP generation.  This is optional and is not
+
+ %I+ - use this to option to insert a dataset into the table. A popup panel
+       will be displayed requiring the install dataset. Once entered, the
+       dialog will read the DSN, generate the destination name, and display
+       the DSN attributes.  At this point, you have the opportunity to
+       change the attributes.
+
+ All other fields can be updated.  You can change the allocation parameters,
+ DCB information if desired and your changes will be saved. All master
+ catalog datasets for SYP1 and SYP2 will automatically generate SYS2 and SYS6
+ entries in the master catalog regardless of what is specified here. In other
+ words, SYS3 datasets will either be changed to a SYS2 or SYS6 prefix.
)INIT
)REINIT
)PROC
)END

FTPGH003.text:
)Attr Default(%+_)
   + type(text  ) intens(low )
   _ type( input) intens(high) caps(on ) just(left )
   ~ type(text) intens(high) color(yellow)
   ! type(output) intens(low) caps(off) just(left )
)Body  width(80) expand(\\)
+ --\-\-- ~Insert dataset Help --\-\--
%Command ===>_ZCMD                                             %Scroll ===>_amt
+ Use this panel to insert a new dataset into your profile.
+
+ Please specify a valid datasetlect a dataset to be generated in the FTP
+       JCL.  This will result in the appropriate JCL, Catalog (if required),
+       nd FTP statements being generated in a JCL member
+
+ %D+ - use this to option to delete a dataset out of the table.  Using this
+       option will remove the dataset from the display and the dataset will
+       not be selected for FTP generation.  This is optional and is not
+
+ %I+ - use this to option to insert a dataset into the table. A popup panel
+       will be displayed requiring the install dataset. Once entered, the
+       dialog will read the DSN, generate the destination name, and display
+       the DSN attributes.  At this point, you have the opportunity to
+       change the attributes.
+
+ All other fields can be updated.  You can change the allocation parameters,
+ DCB information if desired and your changes will be saved. All master
+ catalog datasets for SYP1 and SYP2 will automatically generate SYS2 and SYS6
+ entries in the master catalog regardless of what is specified here. In other
+ words, SYS3 datasets will either be changed to a SYS2 or SYS6 prefix.
)INIT
)REINIT
)PROC
)END

FTPGH004.text:
)Attr Default(%+_)
   + type(text  ) intens(low )
   _ type( input) intens(high) caps(on ) just(left )
   ~ type(text) intens(high) color(yellow)
   ! type(output) intens(low) caps(off) just(left )
)Body  width(80) expand(\\)
+ --\-\-- ~Insert dataset Help --\-\--
%Command ===>_ZCMD                                             %Scroll ===>_amt
+ The following options can be selected on this panel:
+
+ ~Enter DSN to save JCL+    - Enter a valid dataset to save your generated
+                              JCL.
+
+ ~Edit dataset after build+ - Enter ~Y+ (YES) to enter edit on this dataset
+                              after the JCL is generated or ~N+ (NO) to
+                              return to main panel.
+
+ ~Generate job option+      - Select ~M+ to generate a individual job for
+                              each system or ~S+ to generate a single job
+                              as member $FTPJOB.
+
+ ~Use .T temp name   +      - Generate FTP commands with ".T" to avoid
+                              ENQ contention for datasets in DBNPPLEX. A
+                              rename will be done after each FTP to it's
+                              final dataset name.
+
)INIT
)REINIT
)PROC
)END

FTPG0002.text:
)Attr Default(%+_)
   + type(text  ) intens(low )
   _ type( input) intens(high) caps(on ) just(left )
   ~ type(text) intens(high) color(yellow)
   ! type(output) intens(low) caps(off) just(left )
)Body  width(80) expand(\\)
+ --\-\-- ~Generate FTP DSN JCL+ --\-\--
%Command ===>_ZCMD                                             %Scroll ===>_amt
%\ \ ~PF1+- HELP ~PF3+- SAVE \ \
%ACT- SOURCE DATASET NAME                          DS TYPE LRECL   RECFM BLKSIZE
%ION  DESTINATION DATASET NAME                    CY-TR-BL PRIM    SEC   DIRBLKS
)MODEL
_s+ !dsn                                         + _pdst+  _lrecl +_rf+  _blk  +
+   _ndsn                                        + _su +   _pri   +_sec +_dir +
+
)INIT
 .cursor = zcmd
 if (&amt = ' ')
   &amt = 'PAGE'
.help = FTPGH002
)REINIT
)PROC
VER (&pdst  LIST,PDS,PDSE,SEQ,MSG=FTPGM108)
VER (&lrecl NUM)
VER (&rf    LIST,F,FB,U,V,VB,MSG=FTPGM107)
VER (&blk   NUM)
VER (&su    LIST,CY,TR,BL,MSG=FTPGM109)
VER (&pri   NUM)
VER (&sec   NUM)
if (&pdst = PDS)
  VER (&dir   NUM)
VER (&ndsn  NONBLANK,DSNAME)
VER (&s     LIST,I,S,D,MSG=FTPGM004)
if (.resp = ENTER)
 &resp = ENTER
if (.resp = END)
 &resp = END
&pfkey = .PFKEY
)END

FTPG0004.text:
)Attr Default(%+_)
   + type(text  ) intens(low )
   _ type( input) intens(high) caps(on ) just(left ) outline(box)
   ~ type(text) intens(high) color(yellow)
   ! type(output) intens(low) caps(off) just(left )
)Body  window(77,7) expand(\\)
+ --\-\-- ~Edit dataset allocations if required+ --\-\--
%Command ===>_ZCMD
%\ \ ~PF1+- HELP ~PF3+- CANCEL \ \
%SOURCE DATASET NAME                           DS TYPE LRECL   RECFM BLKSIZE
%DESTINATION DATASET NAME                     CY-TR-BL PRIM    SEC   DIRBLKS
!dsn                                          +_pdst+ _lrecl +_rf+  _blk  +
_ndsn                                         +_su +  _pri   +_sec +_dir +
)INIT
 .cursor = ndsn
 if (&amt = ' ')
   &amt = 'PAGE'
.help = FTPGH003
)REINIT
)PROC
*REXX(*,,(FTPG0002))
VER (&pdst  LIST,PDS,PDSE,SEQ,MSG=FTPGM108)
VER (&lrecl NUM)
VER (&rf    LIST,F,FB,U,V,VB,MSG=FTPGM107)
VER (&blk   NUM)
VER (&su    LIST,CY,TR,BL,MSG=FTPGM109)
VER (&pri   NUM)
VER (&sec   NUM)
if (&pdst = PDS)
  VER (&dir   NUM)
VER (&ndsn  NONBLANK,DSNAME)
if (.resp = ENTER)
 &resp = ENTER
if (.resp = END)
 &resp = END
&pfkey = .PFKEY
)END

FTPG0005.text:
)Attr Default(%+_)
   + type(text  ) intens(low )
   _ type( input) intens(high) caps(on ) just(left )
   ~ type(text) intens(high) color(yellow)
   ! type(output) intens(low) caps(off) just(left )
)Body  window(77,13) expand(\\)
+ --\-\-- ~Generate FTP DSN JCL+ --\-\--
+Command %===>_ZCMD
+\ \ ~PF1+- HELP ~PF3+- END \ \
+ Enter DSN to save JCL   %===>_sdsn                                        +
+ Generate job option     %===>_tj+ ~M+- Multiple jobs ~S+- single job      +
+ Edit dataset after build%===>_eopt~Y+- Yes or~N+- No                      +
+ Use .T temp name        %===>_tnam~Y+- Yes or~N+- No ( Specify "Y" to     +
+                                                        avoid ENQ issues)
+ %ENTER "/" TO SELECT SYSTEMS FOR GENERATION
+ %_c1+ CLEAR
+ %_s1+ ALL  %_s2+ A   %_s3+ B   %_s4+ C   %_s5+ D1  %_s6+ D9  %_s7+ E
+            %_s8+ G   %_s9+ H   %_s10+N1  %_s11+N2  %_s12+P1  %_s13+P2
+            %_s14+Q   %_s15+T   %_s16+U   %_s17+Z
)INIT
 .cursor = zcmd
 if (&amt = ' ')
   &amt = 'PAGE'
vget (sdsn) PROFILE
vget (tj  ) PROFILE
vget (eopt) PROFILE
vget (tnam) PROFILE
vget (s2  ) PROFILE
if (&s2 ¬= '/')
  &s2 = ' '
vget (s3  ) PROFILE
if (&s3 ¬= '/')
  &s3 = ' '
vget (s4  ) PROFILE
if (&s4 ¬= '/')
  &s4 = ' '
vget (s6  ) PROFILE
if (&s6 ¬= '/')
  &s6 = ' '
vget (s7  ) PROFILE
if (&s7 ¬= '/')
  &s7 = ' '
vget (s8  ) PROFILE
if (&s8 ¬= '/')
  &s8 = ' '
vget (s9  ) PROFILE
if (&s9 ¬= '/')
  &s9 = ' '
vget (s10 ) PROFILE
if (&s10 ¬= '/')
  &s10= ' '
vget (s11 ) PROFILE
if (&s11 ¬= '/')
  &s11= ' '
vget (s12 ) PROFILE
if (&s12 ¬= '/')
  &s12= ' '
vget (s13 ) PROFILE
if (&s13 ¬= '/')
  &s13= ' '
vget (s14 ) PROFILE
if (&s14 ¬= '/')
  &s14= ' '
vget (s15 ) PROFILE
if (&s15 ¬= '/')
  &s15= ' '
vget (s16 ) PROFILE
if (&s16 ¬= '/')
  &s16= ' '
vget (s17 ) PROFILE
if (&s17 ¬= '/')
  &s17= ' '
)REINIT
)PROC
*REXX(*,,(FTPG0002))
VER (&tj    LIST,NONBLANK,M,S)
VER (&eopt  LIST,NONBLANK,Y,N)
VER (&tnam  LIST,NONBLANK,Y,N)
VER (&sdsn  NONBLANK,DSNAME)
VER (&c1    LIST,'/')
VER (&s1    LIST,'/')
VER (&s2    LIST,'/')
VER (&s3    LIST,'/')
VER (&s4    LIST,'/')
VER (&s5    LIST,'/')
VER (&s6    LIST,'/')
VER (&s7    LIST,'/')
VER (&s8    LIST,'/')
VER (&s9    LIST,'/')
VER (&s10   LIST,'/')
VER (&s11   LIST,'/')
VER (&s12   LIST,'/')
VER (&s13   LIST,'/')
VER (&s14   LIST,'/')
VER (&s15   LIST,'/')
VER (&s16   LIST,'/')
VER (&s17   LIST,'/')
vput (sdsn) PROFILE
vput (eopt) PROFILE
vput (tj  ) PROFILE
vput (tnam) PROFILE
if (.resp = ENTER)
 &resp = ENTER
if (.resp = END)
 &resp = END
&pfkey = .PFKEY
)END
